mapper.select: select rl.line_No, rl.qty, rl.lpn_code, rl.box_code, rl.sn_code, rl.loc_code, rl.sku_code, rl.sku_name, rl.sku_level, rl.sku_spec, rl.wh_code, rl.owner_code, user.real_name createUser, rl.create_time from receive_log rl LEFT JOIN blade_user user ON user.id = rl.create_user where receive_id = #{receiveId}
SELECT sku_id, sku_code, sum(qty) as qty FROM receive_log WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= create_time GROUP BY sku_id, sku_code ORDER BY qty DESC limit 10
